<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例一：将整个<span lang="EN-US"> /etc </span>目录下的文件全部打包成为<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp/etc.tar<br>
[root@linux ~]# tar -cvf /tmp/etc.tar /etc <==</span>仅打包，不压缩！<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# tar -zcvf /tmp/etc.tar.gz /etc <==</span>打包后，以<span lang="EN-US"> gzip </span>压缩<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# tar -jcvf /tmp/etc.tar.bz2 /etc <==</span>打包后，以<span lang="EN-US"> bzip2 </span>压缩<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>特别注意，在参数<span lang="EN-US"> f </span>之后的文件档名是自己取的，我们习惯上都用<span lang="EN-US"> .tar </span>来作为辨识。<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>如果加<span lang="EN-US"> z </span>参数，则以<span lang="EN-US"> .tar.gz </span>或<span lang="EN-US"> .tgz </span>来代表<span lang="EN-US"> gzip </span>压缩过的<span lang="EN-US">
tar file </span>～<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>如果加<span lang="EN-US"> j </span>参数，则以<span lang="EN-US"> .tar.bz2 </span>来作为附档名啊～<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>上述指令在执行的时候，会显示一个警告讯息：<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>『<span lang="EN-US">tar: Removing leading `/” from member names</span>』那是关於绝对路径的特殊设定。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例二：查阅上述<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp/etc.tar.gz </span>文件内有哪些文件？<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# tar -ztvf /tmp/etc.tar.gz<br>
# </span>由於我们使用<span lang="EN-US"> gzip </span>压缩，所以要查阅该<span lang="EN-US"> tar
file </span>内的文件时，<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>就得要加上<span lang="EN-US"> z </span>这个参数了！这很重要的！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例三：将<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp/etc.tar.gz </span>文件解压缩在<span lang="EN-US"> /usr/local/src </span>底下<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# cd /usr/local/src<br>
[root@linux src]# tar -zxvf /tmp/etc.tar.gz<br>
# </span>在预设的情况下，我们可以将压缩档在任何地方解开的！以这个范例来说，<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>我先将工作目录变换到<span lang="EN-US"> /usr/local/src </span>底下，并且解开<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp/etc.tar.gz </span>，<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>则解开的目录会在<span lang="EN-US"> /usr/local/src/etc </span>呢！另外，如果您进入<span lang="EN-US"> /usr/local/src/etc<br>
# </span>则会发现，该目录下的文件属性与<span lang="EN-US"> /etc/ </span>可能会有所不同喔！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例四：在<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp </span>底下，我只想要将<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp/etc.tar.gz </span>内的<span lang="EN-US"> etc/passwd </span>解开而已<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# cd /tmp<br>
[root@linux tmp]# tar -zxvf /tmp/etc.tar.gz etc/passwd<br>
# </span>我可以透过<span lang="EN-US"> tar -ztvf </span>来查阅<span lang="EN-US"> tarfile </span>内的文件名称，如果单只要一个文件，<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>就可以透过这个方式来下达！注意到！<span lang="EN-US"> etc.tar.gz </span>内的根目录<span lang="EN-US"> / </span>是被拿掉了！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例五：将<span lang="EN-US"> /etc/ </span>内的所有文件备份下来，并且保存其权限！<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# tar -zxvpf /tmp/etc.tar.gz /etc<br>
# </span>这个<span lang="EN-US"> -p </span>的属性是很重要的，尤其是当您要保留原本文件的属性时！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例六：在<span lang="EN-US"> /home </span>当中，比<span lang="EN-US"> 2005/06/01 </span>新的文件才备份<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# tar -N ‘2005/06/01</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lucida Sans Unicode";mso-font-kerning:0pt">′</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"> -zcvf home.tar.gz
/home<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例七：我要备份<span lang="EN-US"> /home, /etc </span>，但不要<span lang="EN-US"> /home/dmtsai<br>
[root@linux ~]# tar –exclude /home/dmtsai -zcvf myfile.tar.gz /home/* /etc<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">范例八：将<span lang="EN-US"> /etc/ </span>打包后直接解开在<span lang="EN-US"> /tmp </span>底下，而不产生文件！<span lang="EN-US"><br>
[root@linux ~]# cd /tmp<br>
[root@linux tmp]# tar -cvf – /etc | tar -xvf –<br>
# </span>这个动作有点像是<span lang="EN-US"> cp -r /etc /tmp </span>啦～依旧是有其有用途的！<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>要注意的地方在於输出档变成<span lang="EN-US"> – </span>而输入档也变成<span lang="EN-US"> – </span>，又有一个<span lang="EN-US"> | </span>存在～<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>这分别代表<span lang="EN-US"> standard output, standard input </span>与管线命令啦！<span lang="EN-US"><br>
# </span>这部分我们会在<span lang="EN-US"> Bash shell </span>时，再次提到这个指令跟大家再解释啰！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 36pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">.tar<br>
</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　解包：<span lang="EN-US">tar xvf FileName.tar<br>
</span>　　打包：<span lang="EN-US">tar cvf FileName.tar DirName<br>
</span>　　（注：<span lang="EN-US">tar</span>是打包，不是压缩！）<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">———————————————<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.gz<br>
</span>　　解压<span lang="EN-US">1</span>：<span lang="EN-US">gunzip FileName.gz<br>
</span>　　解压<span lang="EN-US">2</span>：<span lang="EN-US">gzip -d FileName.gz<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">gzip FileName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.tar.gz </span>和<span lang="EN-US"> .tgz<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">tar zxvf FileName.tar.gz<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">tar zcvf FileName.tar.gz DirName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">———————————————<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.bz2<br>
</span>　　解压<span lang="EN-US">1</span>：<span lang="EN-US">bzip2 -d FileName.bz2<br>
</span>　　解压<span lang="EN-US">2</span>：<span lang="EN-US">bunzip2 FileName.bz2<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US"> bzip2 -z FileName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.tar.bz2<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">tar jxvf FileName.tar.bz2 </span>或<span lang="EN-US">tar –bzip xvf FileName.tar.bz2<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">tar jcvf FileName.tar.bz2 DirName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">———————————————<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.bz<br>
</span>　　解压<span lang="EN-US">1</span>：<span lang="EN-US">bzip2 -d FileName.bz<br>
</span>　　解压<span lang="EN-US">2</span>：<span lang="EN-US">bunzip2 FileName.bz<br>
</span>　　压缩：未知<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.tar.bz<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">tar jxvf FileName.tar.bz<br>
</span>　　压缩：未知<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">———————————————<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.Z<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">uncompress FileName.Z<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">compress FileName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.tar.Z<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">tar Zxvf FileName.tar.Z<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">tar Zcvf FileName.tar.Z DirName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">———————————————<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.zip<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">unzip FileName.zip<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">zip FileName.zip DirName<br>
</span>　　压缩一个目录使用<span lang="EN-US"> -r </span>参数，<span lang="EN-US">-r </span>递归。例：<span lang="EN-US"> $ zip -r FileName.zip DirName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">———————————————<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">.rar<br>
</span>　　解压：<span lang="EN-US">rar x FileName.rar<br>
</span>　　压缩：<span lang="EN-US">rar a FileName.rar DirName<br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">rar</span>请到：<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.rarsoft.com/download.htm"><span style="color:blue">http://www.rarsoft.com/download.htm</span></a>
<a href="http://www.2cto.com/soft" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:blue">下载</span></a></span>！<span lang="EN-US"><br>
</span>　　解压后请将<span lang="EN-US">rar_static</span>拷贝到<span lang="EN-US">/usr/bin</span>目录（其他由<span lang="EN-US">$PATH</span>环境变量指定的目录也可以）：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

mso-fareast-theme-font:major-fareast;mso-hansi-theme-font:major-fareast;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">摘自：<span lang="EN-US">webshell blog<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
